TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academy[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's scientific research as well as providing a small amount of culture.
Administrative Center

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Airports[COLOR_REVERT] add an additional trade route, provide an experience bonus to all Air Units, house four extra Air Units for a total of eight and can airlift one unit per turn to any of your other cities. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Airports[COLOR_REVERT] also add unhealthiness.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mall[COLOR_REVERT], the American replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarket[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Electricity[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Refrigeration[COLOR_REVERT] technology, increases the city's commerce output, allows you to hire a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and increases the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Football Events[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Singles[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Movies[COLOR_REVERT].
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Administrative Center[COLOR_REVERT] reduces the maintenance costs in nearby cities. It increases the chances of creating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Madrassa[COLOR_REVERT], the Arabian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], provides double the culture and allows you to hire two [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueducts[COLOR_REVERT] improve a city's health.
American Embassy
Arabian Embassy
Argentine Embassy
Cold Storage Plant

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cold Storage Plant[COLOR_REVERT], the Argentine replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarket[COLOR_REVERT], increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cows[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pigs[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sacrificial Altar[COLOR_REVERT], the Aztec replacements for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouse[COLOR_REVERT], reduces the anger duration from sacrificing population and is cheaper.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Banks[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increase a city's production of wealth. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Banks[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stock Exchange[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Terrace[COLOR_REVERT], the Incan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Granary[COLOR_REVERT], provides culture.
Totem Pole
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Totem Pole[COLOR_REVERT], the Native American replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], grants archery units three bonus experience.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Barracks[COLOR_REVERT] grant experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Land Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in its city.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bomb Shelters[COLOR_REVERT] reduce damage from nuclear attacks.
Aztec Embassy
Babylonian Embassy

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Broadcast Towers[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increase a city's cultural output. They also increase the happiness output from using the culture slider, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Football Events[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Singles[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Movies[COLOR_REVERT].
Brazilian Embassy
Fazenda

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fazenda[COLOR_REVERT], the Brazilian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocer[COLOR_REVERT], increases the city's health with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT] and also increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bananas[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tobacco[COLOR_REVERT].
Byzantine Embassy
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bunkers[COLOR_REVERT] reduce damage from air attacks.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Buddhist Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stupa[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Royal Mounted Police[COLOR_REVERT], the Canadian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jail[COLOR_REVERT], provides extra happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hippodrome[COLOR_REVERT], the Byzantine replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatre[COLOR_REVERT], increases happiness, increases the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT], doubles the happiness output from using the culture slider and loses one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
Royal Mounted Police
Carthaginian Embassy
Chinese Embassy
Confucian Academy

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] increase your cities' defense against pre-gunpowder units, increase espionage output, generate a small amount of culture and also provide one extra trade route.
Taixue

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taixue[COLOR_REVERT], the Chinese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], provides extra culture and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
Catholic Cathedral

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
Catholic Monastery

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catholic Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
Catholic Church

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Churches[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. They also allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
Colombian Embassy
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coal Plants[COLOR_REVERT] provide power and unhealthiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coal[COLOR_REVERT].
Hacienda

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hacienda[COLOR_REVERT], the Colombian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocer[COLOR_REVERT], increases the city's health with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT] and also increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bananas[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT].
Amphitheatre
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amphitheatres[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and its happiness output from using the culture slider.
Congolese Embassy

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academy[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Confucian Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouses[COLOR_REVERT] lower city maintenance costs, provide you with a bonus to espionage and are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Administrative Centers[COLOR_REVERT].
Customs House
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Customs Houses[COLOR_REVERT] increase the commerce generated by a city's Foreign Trade Routes.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Drydocks[COLOR_REVERT] build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Water Units[COLOR_REVERT] much faster and grant [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Naval Units[COLOR_REVERT] experience points, but also add unhealthiness to the city.
Egyptian Embassy
Obelisk

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisk[COLOR_REVERT], the Egyptian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], provides a major bonus to Culture output in your city and allows you to hire a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dun[COLOR_REVERT], the Celtic replacement for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT], gives all eligible units built in this city the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guerrilla I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
[ICON_BULLET]Establishes permanent contact with this civilization
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Etablit un contact permanent avec cette civilisation
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Gewährleistet den ständigen Kontakt mit dieser Zivilisation
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Stabilisce un contatto permanente con questa civiltà.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Requires 10 [ICON_ESPIONAGE] against this civilization
Embassy
Establishes permanent contact with other civilizations
TEXT.French: Etablit un contact permanent avec d'autres civilisations
TEXT.German: Gewährleistet den ständigen Kontakt mit anderen Zivilisationen
TEXT.Italian: Stabilisce un contatto permanente con altre civiltà.
TEXT.Spanish: Establece contacto permanente con otras civilizaciones

TEXT.English: English Embassy
Royal Exchange
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Royal Exchange[COLOR_REVERT], the English replacement for a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bank[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's production of wealth more.
Ethiopian Embassy

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stele[COLOR_REVERT], the Ethiopian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], allows you to hire two [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists.
French Embassy

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's production at the cost of adding significant unhealthiness. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factories[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Industrial Parks[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coal Plants[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hydro Plants[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nuclear Plants[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Industrial Parks[COLOR_REVERT] provides a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialist. This comes at a significant cost to your city's health.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Intelligence Agencies[COLOR_REVERT] increase the espionage points created by the city and grant experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Espionage Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in their city.
Caravanserai

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Caravanserai[COLOR_REVERT], the Iranian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT], provides an extra trade route, increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] increase production, increases the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gems[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gold[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silver[COLOR_REVERT], but also adds unhealthiness. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eiffel Tower[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Liberty[COLOR_REVERT] world wonders, and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ironworks[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Salon[COLOR_REVERT], the French replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jail[COLOR_REVERT], provides a cultural bonus, a happiness bonus if the city has access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tea[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tobacco[COLOR_REVERT] and increases the birthrate of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great People[COLOR_REVERT].
Unique Argentine building which replaces the supermarket. Provides additional gold with cow, pig and sheep.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Assembly Plant[COLOR_REVERT], the German replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factory[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's unit production, gives one free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and is produced 50% faster with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coal[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Granaries[COLOR_REVERT] store food to help increase a city's growth rate.
German Embassy
Ger

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ger[COLOR_REVERT], the Mongol replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stable[COLOR_REVERT], grant even more experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in its city. It also increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cows[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT].
Greek Embassy

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Odeon[COLOR_REVERT], the Greek replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatre[COLOR_REVERT], increase a city's happiness, requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Aesthetics[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Drama[COLOR_REVERT] technology and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocers[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's wealth. It also increases the city's health with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bananas[COLOR_REVERT]. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocers[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarkets[COLOR_REVERT].
Bath

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bath[COLOR_REVERT], the Harappan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT], doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mathematics[COLOR_REVERT] technology, is cheaper and provides culture.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbors[COLOR_REVERT] improve the food output of water plots. A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbor[COLOR_REVERT] is required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Customs Houses[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]San Marco Basilica[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trafalgar Square[COLOR_REVERT] world wonders.
Dutch Embassy

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mandir[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hindu Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture. The first player to build a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Temple[COLOR_REVERT] founds Buddhism.
Holy Roman Embassy
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Rathaus[COLOR_REVERT], the German replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouse[COLOR_REVERT], lowers city maintenance costs even further.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hospitals[COLOR_REVERT] help units heal damage more quickly and adds health to a city. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hospitals[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Red Cross Society[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
Incan Embassy
Tambo

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tambo[COLOR_REVERT], the Incan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castle[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Construction[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Engineering[COLOR_REVERT] technology and generates extra culture.
Indian Embassy
Edict
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Edict[COLOR_REVERT], the Indian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], lowers city maintenance costs and never goes obsolete.
Mausoleum

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mausoleum[COLOR_REVERT], the Mughal replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jail[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Patronage[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Constitution[COLOR_REVERT] technology, provides a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] and allows you to hire one extra [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
Stepwell
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stepwell[COLOR_REVERT], the Indian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT], doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mathematics[COLOR_REVERT] technology.
Candi
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Candi[COLOR_REVERT], the Indonesian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], provides one culture, one production and never goes obsolete.
Indonesian Embassy
Italian Embassy
Art Studio

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Art Studio[COLOR_REVERT], the Italian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forge[COLOR_REVERT], provides a big culture boost and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mosque[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Islamic Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Islamic Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Islamic Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Islamic Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture.
Japanese Embassy
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jails[COLOR_REVERT] lower a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]War Weariness[COLOR_REVERT] and increase espionage significantly.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hydro Plants[COLOR_REVERT] provide pollution-free power for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factories[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nuclear Plants[COLOR_REVERT] provide pollution-free power for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factories[COLOR_REVERT] with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Uranium[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Observatories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's scientific research. They are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratories[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zaibatsu[COLOR_REVERT], the Japanese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factory[COLOR_REVERT], is cheaper, gives one free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and improves the commerce output of water plots.
Zaibatsu
Khmer Embassy
Mbwadi
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Baray[COLOR_REVERT], the Khmer replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT], provides one extra food.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mbwadi[COLOR_REVERT], the Congolese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT], increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cotton[COLOR_REVERT].
Korean Embassy

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Markets[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's wealth. They also increase the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ivory[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whales[COLOR_REVERT].
Mint
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mint[COLOR_REVERT], the Mandinka replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forge[COLOR_REVERT], provides a small increase in wealth.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Levees[COLOR_REVERT] provide a production bonus from all river tiles worked by the city.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lighthouses[COLOR_REVERT] increase that city's income from trade routes and increase that city's health from access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Clam[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Crab[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fish[COLOR_REVERT] resources.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Seowon[COLOR_REVERT], the Korean replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Paper[COLOR_REVERT] technology and doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Education[COLOR_REVERT] technology.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universities[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's research and provide culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universities[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]CERN Research Complex[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trading Post[COLOR_REVERT], the Viking replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Sailing[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Compass[COLOR_REVERT] technology, gives all ships built in this city the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Navigation I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] boost your city's research and provide culture. They are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universities[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's scientific research and its spaceship production, but also add unhealthiness.
Malinese Embassy
Mayan Embassy
Ball Court

French.Text: Terrain de jeu de balle:Terrains de jeu de balle

Spanish.Text: Campo del juego de pelota:Campos del juego de pelota

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ball Court[COLOR_REVERT], the Mayan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amphitheatre[COLOR_REVERT], provides one extra happiness, requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mathematics[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Construction[COLOR_REVERT] technology and grants experience points to melee and archery units built in its city.
Charreada Arena

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Charreada Arena[COLOR_REVERT], the Mexican replacement for a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amphitheatre[COLOR_REVERT], grants experience points to mounted units built in its city and increases happiness from access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Military Academies[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's military unit production and provide culture.
Mongolian Embassy
Moorish Embassy
Noria
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Noria[COLOR_REVERT], the Moorish replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT], provides a production bonus and is cheaper.
Dike

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dike[COLOR_REVERT], the Dutch replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Levee[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Replaceable Parts[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Steam Power[COLOR_REVERT] technology and provides a production bonus from all water tiles worked by a city.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's defenses against pre-gunpowder units. They are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT].
Mughal Embassy
Orthodox Cathedral

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Orthodoxy[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
Pagan Temple

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Apothecary[COLOR_REVERT], the Persian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's health and increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temples[COLOR_REVERT] provide a small amount of culture.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hammam[COLOR_REVERT], the Ottoman replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's happiness.
Orthodox Monastery

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Orthodox Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
Orthodox Church
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Churches[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture.
Persian Embassy
Glassmaker
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Glassmaker[COLOR_REVERT], the Phoenician replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's trade route yield.
Plague
Polish Embassy

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Feitoria[COLOR_REVERT], the Portuguese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Customs House[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Banking[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Astronomy[COLOR_REVERT] technologies, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Economics[COLOR_REVERT] technology and improves the commerce output of water plots.
Feitoria
Sejmik
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sejmik[COLOR_REVERT], the Polish replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouse[COLOR_REVERT], provides a small cash and happiness bonus.
Mala'e

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mala'e[COLOR_REVERT], the Polynesian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amphitheatre[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Priesthood[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Construction[COLOR_REVERT] technology, is cheaper, provides culture and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] and one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
Protestant Cathedral

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
Protestant Monastery

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Protestant Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
Protestant Church
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Recycling Centers[COLOR_REVERT] removes all unhealthiness from buildings.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Public Transportation[COLOR_REVERT] provides a bonus to health in your city and an added bonus for access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oil[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Churches[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture.
Portuguese Embassy
Roman Embassy
Russian Embassy

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Research Institute[COLOR_REVERT], the Russian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratory[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Electricity[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Computers[COLOR_REVERT] technologyprovides a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and allows you to hire one extra [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
Security Bureau
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stables[COLOR_REVERT] grant experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in their cities.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Security Bureaus[COLOR_REVERT] increase the cost of enemy espionage missions in their city, grant [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Informant I[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Espionage Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in its city and are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lubyanka[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Citadel[COLOR_REVERT], the Spanish replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castle[COLOR_REVERT], is half the production cost and grants experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] built in its city.
Smokehouse

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Smokehouses[COLOR_REVERT] increase the city's health with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cows[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pigs[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT].
Spanish Embassy

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forum[COLOR_REVERT], the Roman replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate and allows you to hire two [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialists.
Ziggurat

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ziggurat[COLOR_REVERT], the Babylonian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Polytheism[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mysticism[COLOR_REVERT] technology, provides extra culture and gives a small science and culture boost.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarkets[COLOR_REVERT] provide food and increase the city's health with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Corn[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rice[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wheat[COLOR_REVERT].
Tamil Embassy
Sangam

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sangam[COLOR_REVERT], the Tamil replacement the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], provides an extra cultural boost and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ikhanda[COLOR_REVERT], the Zulu replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Barracks[COLOR_REVERT], are more expensive and lower city maintenance costs.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pavillion[COLOR_REVERT], the Chinese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatre[COLOR_REVERT], provides an extra cultural boost

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagoda[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Toaist Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Taoist Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture.
Thai Embassy
Ho Trai
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ho Trai[COLOR_REVERT], the Thai replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], increases happiness and is cheaper.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatres[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's culture and increase the happiness output from using the culture slider. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatres[COLOR_REVERT] also provide culture and is required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Opera House[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
Tibetan Embassy
Tibetan Embassy
Gompa

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gompa[COLOR_REVERT], the Tibetan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University[COLOR_REVERT], provides less research, increases a city's defenses against pre-gunpowder units, allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialist, provides a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialist, doesn't require a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Education[COLOR_REVERT] technology and requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Paper[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Engineering[COLOR_REVERT] technologies.
Turkish Embassy
Viking Embassy
Zoroastrian Royal Fire

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Royal Fire[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Synagogue[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
Zoroastrian Monastery

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Zoroastrian Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Jewish Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
Zoroastrian Temple
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture.
